title: Methods in Behavioral Research 11th c2012 Cozby & Bates
description:
Methods in Behavioral Research, 11th Edition (c2012), textbook by Paul C. Cozby & Scott C. Bates.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0078035155/information_center_view0/index.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0078035155/information_center_view0/index.html</a>
(current: 12th c2015 <a href=" http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0077861892/information_center_view0/index.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0077861892/information_center_view0/index.html</a> )

FEATURES: Brevity, clear writing and examples, decision-making emphasis and objective evaluation.

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
1. SCIENTIFIC UNDERSTANDING OF BEHAVIOR
2. WHERE TO START
3. ETHICAL RESEARCH
4. FUNDAMENTAL RESEARCH ISSUES
5. MEASUREMENT CONCEPTS
6. OBSERVATIONAL METHODS
7. ASKING PEOPLE ABOUT THEMSELVES: SURVEY RESEARCH
8. EXPERIMENTAL DESIGN
9. CONDUCTING EXPERIMENTS
10. COMPLEX EXPERIMENTAL DESIGNS
11. SINGLE-CASE, QUASI-EXPERIMENTAL, AND DEVELOPMENTAL RESEARCH
12. UNDERSTANDING RESEARCH RESULTS: DESCRIPTION AND CORRELATION
13. UNDERSTANDING RESEARCH RESULTS: STATISTICAL INFERENCE
14. GENERALIZING RESULTS
APPENDICES:
 A: WRITING RESEARCH REPORTS
 B: STATISTICAL TESTS
 C: STATISTICAL TABLES
(detailed contents at website above)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF
